Articles.Content:
Can someone direct me on how to update my driver? I had to reinstall it recently and it is an old version, everywhere I look is shady or spam and virus filled. Or just trying to make me buy new drivers.

I have ATI Radeon Xpress 1250

ATI was bought by AMD. Go to the AMD website for drivers.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

http://www.amd.com/uk/products/notebook/chipsets/radeon-xpress-1250/Pages/ati-radeon-express-1250.aspx

I've found that page before, I just didn't find a way to update said driver

I feel like I'm making a very easy task hard

Xpress1250 is a notebook chip if i didnt recall wrong...

while the ATI CCC software auto updates every month anyways; AMD may or may not support it

(my Lenovo laptop uses HD5670M and ATI CCC havent been updating its driver for like 2 yrs already)
